description: Increased risk of bleeding and bruising
mechanism: Additive anticoagulant effect - both drugs inhibit platelet function
management: Avoid combination. If necessary, monitor INR closely and watch for bleeding signs

mechanism: NSAIDs inhibit prostaglandins that protect gastric mucosa + potentiate warfarin effect
management: Use alternative analgesic. If unavoidable, monitor INR and use gastric protection

description: Increased risk of myopathy and rhabdomyolysis
mechanism: Clarithromycin inhibits CYP3A4 metabolism of simvastatin
management: Avoid combination. Use alternative statin or antibiotic

description: Risk of digoxin toxicity due to hypokalemia
mechanism: Furosemide causes potassium loss which sensitizes myocardium to digoxin
management: Monitor potassium levels regularly. Maintain potassium >4.0 mEq/L

mechanism: Contrast media impair renal function leading to metformin accumulation
management: Stop metformin 48 hours before and after contrast procedure
Monitor potassium levels. Avoid potassium supplements

mechanism: SSRIs inhibit platelet serotonin uptake, NSAIDs inhibit prostaglandins
management: Use with caution. Consider gastric protection with PPI

mechanism: Both drugs depress SA and AV node function
management: Monitor heart rate and blood pressure. Start with low doses

mechanism: Calcium binds levothyroxine in GI tract
management: Administer levothyroxine 4 hours before or after calcium

mechanism: Antibiotics may alter gut flora affecting enterohepatic recycling
management: Use backup contraception during antibiotic therapy

mechanism: Omeprazole inhibits CYP2C19 which may affect warfarin metabolism
management: Monitor INR when starting or stopping omeprazole

description: Increased statin levels and toxicity risk
mechanism: Grapefruit inhibits CYP3A4 metabolism of statins
management: Avoid large quantities of grapefruit juice with statins

description: Increased lithium levels and toxicity risk
management: Avoid combination. Monitor lithium levels if used together
Maintain consistent vitamin K intake. Monitor INR
